problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,AD是角平分线,AE是中线,CF⊥AD于点F,AC=5,AB=13,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD is the angular bisector, AE is the midline, CF ⊥ AD at point F, AC = N_0, AB = N_1, then the length of EF is ()
raw_answer: 解:延长CF交AB于G,如图所示:∵AD是△ABC的角平分线,∴∠GAF=∠CAF,在△AGF和△ACF中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠GAF=∠CAF}\\{AF=AF}\\{∠AFG=∠AFC=90^{°}}\end{array}\right.,∴△AGF≌△ACF(ASA),∴AG=AC=5,GF=CF,则BG=AB-AG=13-5=8．又∵AE是△ABC的中线,∴BE=CE,∴EF是△BCG的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BG=4．故选:D．
